channel.title: Wearing Items
channel.description:
Im pretty sure everyone knows that when you drop a hellcat in a server, only the head shows. Is there anyway to make it that you can make an option on it that says wear? Then, when you click it, you see it on the ground move with you?
Thanks

item.title: Wearing Items
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

You can make the wear option if you make your own client, but it can be done without the wear.

if(droppedItem == 7582) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(3504, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(2), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; } When you drop the hellcat, a hellcat npc appears and follows you when you move.

Read full topic
